atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the seatback frames and seat cushion frame may injury your hands.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT HEADREST ASSEMBLY
REMOVE REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE LOWER COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Return the seatback to the upright position.
Remove the 2 screws and lower cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw and release handle.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws and reclining cover.
Remove the 3 bolts, spacer, plate and seatback.
Open the fastening tape.
Using a screwdriver, detach the hooks and open the lower part of the seatback cover.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Roll up the seatback cover.
Detach the 4 claws and remove the 2 headrest supports.
Remove the seatback cover (with pad) from the seatback frame.
Remove the 3 hog rings and seatback cover from the seatback pad.
Remove the 2 screws.
Using a clip remover, remove the 2 clips.
Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 claws and remove the hinge cover.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LEG COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 lock release buttons and fully extend the release band.
Remove the 3 screws and leg cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws and hinge cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 3 SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws and hinge cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the nut connecting the inner belt to the seat leg. Then remove the belt through the hole in the seat cushion cover (with pad).

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT LAP TYPE CENTER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the belt through the hole in the No. 2 seat cushion cover (with pad).

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 2 SEAT LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, remove the No. 3 seat cushion spring from the leg as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts and leg.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT CUSHION COVER

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 hooks.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Open the zippers and then remove the seat cushion cover (with pad).
Remove the 8 hog rings and seat cushion cover (with pad) from the seat cushion frame.
Remove the 6 hog rings and seat cushion cover from the seat cushion pad.
Remove the 2 bolts and plate.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 3 SEAT OUTER FRONT LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt, 2 plates and leg.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 3 SEAT OUTER REAR LEG SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt, 2 plates and leg.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 2 FOLD SEAT STOPPER BAND ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw and stopper band.
